Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ribosome-inactivating protein saporin-1 (SAP-1; SO-4; rRNA N-glycosidase; Plant defense)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the ribosome-inactivating protein family (Type 1 RIP subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Ribosome-inactivating protein of type 1, inhibits protein synthesis in animal cells (By similarity).

Literature.Title: N-terminal sequence of some ribosome-inactivating proteins.
Literature.Reference: Int J Pept Protein Res. 1989 Apr;33(4)263-267.
Literature.Author: Montecucchi PC, Lazzarini AM, Barbieri L, Stirpe F, Soria M, Lappi D.
